snippet: Line by line, an account of the results if Washington fails to act to head off about $100 billion spending cuts scheduled to begin Jan. 2, 2013.
abstract: Obama administration report to Congress details the potential effects if Congress fails to head off about $100 billion in military and domestic spending cuts scheduled to begin in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Line by line, an account of the results if Washington fails to act to head off about $100 billion spending cuts scheduled to begin Jan. 2, 2013.

headline.seo: White House Report Details Effects of Automatic Budget Cuts
headline.main: White House Details Potential Effects If Automatic Budget Cuts Go Through
headline.print_headline: White House Details Potential Effects If Automatic Budget Cuts Go Through
